shortDescription: "The scope of variables declared in a for loop header extends beyond the loop"

The scope of a variable defined in a for loop header extends beyond that loop.

frontmatter.shortDescription: The scope of variables declared in a for loop header extends beyond the loop
frontmatter.shortCorrection: The scope of variables declared in a for loop header is limited to the loop
